meaning: repress, well, now, in the first place, push, shove, press, seal, do in spite of

onyomiExamples.meaning: check, checkmate, stave off, control, restraint, inhibit, deterrent, deterrence

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to keep within limits (e.g. spending), to restrain (e.g. emotions), to control, to curb, to hold in check, to hold back (e.g. an enemy), to check, to curb, to contain, to quell, to subdue, to suppress, to repress
